El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de ropa) que comprará de las comerciantes que venden por mayor y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella vive en concubinato y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gustan las capacitaciones en salud y crédito.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Kantutas de Exalatción" will begin its first loan cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the regional center of Villa Exaltación. It consists of nine members and is governed by a board of directors, with Señora Gimena as its president. The members of the communal bank conduct a variety of businesses. Among them are transportation, store and butcher shop, hardware store, cosmetics sales, accommodations, selling clothing, selling sweaters, and selling sandwiches.

The loan that they will take out will benefit these little micro-entrepreneurs, one of whom is Señora Gimena. She comments that this is the first time that she has been part of Pro Mujer, joining at the invitation of her friend, who is a member of the institution. Now she has a business of selling clothes. She tells us that she began this business with the encouragement of her parents a number of years ago.

The loan that she will take out now will be used to increase her capital by purchasing clothing to sell; she will buy from wholesale dealers and will then sell at her sales location. This form of work allows her to generate income to support her family, since she is in a common-law marriage and has two children.

When she is asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the health training and the loans.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell.

loans.name: Joselin Stefania

texts.es:
Joselin es una joven de 20 años, es soltera, vive con sus padres y hermanos en la ciudad de Chincha, a pesar de su corta edad Joselin es una joven trabajadora y entusiasta que tiene un gran deseo de superación y muchas ganas de ayudar a sus padres, ya que desea agradecerles por los cuidados y apoyo brindados; en sus ratos libres le gusta dedicar tiempo a sus estudios y en algunas oportunidades invita a su familia un riquísimo Pollo a la Brasa para compartir con ellos.
Con mucho empeño, entusiasmo y con el apoyo de sus padres, Joselin se encuentra estudiando la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas, gracias a ello y a su esfuerzo ella trabaja como auxiliar contable en una empresa de su ciudad, Joselin se siente a gusto realizando su labor ya que lo consideran mucho por su buen desempeño y trato amable hacia los demás.
Joselin se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos para la tramitación de su matrícula y pago de mensualidades en su centro de estudios; de esta manera Joselin podrá mejorar su condición académica y reforzar sus conocimientos, para así poder desarrollarse como una buena profesional y con ello espera poder obtener un buen trabajo con el cual pueda seguir apoyando a mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Joselin is a young woman of twenty. She is single and lives with her parents and brothers in the ciy of Chincha. Her youth does not prevent her from being hardworking and enthusiastic, eager to do her best and wanting to help her parents. She is very grateful to them for raising her and taking care of her. In her spare time she likes to study and to cook for her family, her signature dish being braised chicken. With a lot of dedication, enthusiasm, and her parents' support, she is studying business administration. Thanks to that and her efforts she is working as an accountant in a company in her city. Joselin  is happy with her work, as are her employers, who value her efforts and her good relationship with colleagues. Joselin is very grateful to Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help she will be able to cover the costs of obtaining her professional licence and the cost of enrollment in her school. Thus she will be able to have a higher diploma and learn more about her trade, in order to become a knowledgeable professional and get a good job with which to continue helping her family have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to cover her education costs.

loans.name: Cesar Rolando

texts.es:
Cesar es un hombre de 26 años muy trabajador, él  vive en la ciudad de Pisco, caracterizada por sus hermosas playas y clima cálido. Cuando Cesar cuenta con tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte, siendo su comida favorita el delicioso Cau Cau de Pollo; con mucho empeño logró concluir sus estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado poder cursar la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas. 
Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación, y gracias al apoyo de su madre, Cesar se dedica a la venta de abarrotes, especialmente de tubérculos, él trabaja diariamente un aproximado de 14 horas y puede atender hasta 20 ó más clientes, debido a su experiencia, acogida y carisma hacia la atención de ellos.  
Cesar se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a ellos va poder comprar más mercadería, tales como arroz, azúcar, aceite, etc. , para equipar mejor su negocio de venta de abarrotes y con ello más adelante podrá obtener un puesto en el mercado de su ciudad, de esta manera podrá mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida para él y su familia.
texts.en: Cesar is twenty-six and very hardworking. He lives in the town of Pisco, know for its beautiful beaches and warm climate. In his spare time, he likes to practice sports, and his favourite dish is 'cau cau de pollo' (Peruvian diced chicken). He managed to finish secondary school, but he would have liked to continue his studies and graduate in business administration. With a lot of effort and dedication, and the support of his mother, Cesar sell groceries, principally tubers. He works about fourteen hours every day and tends to more than twenty customers, thanks to his experience and the warm welcome he gives them. Cesar is very grateful to Kiva lenders, whose help will enable him to buy more merchandise to sell in his shop, such as rice, sugar, oil, etc. Thus his grocery shop will be better-stocked and he will stand a chance to have a stall in the city's market. He will then be able to improve his income and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Lesvi Lizeth

texts.es: Lesvi tiene 37 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos y vive en Puerto Cortes.  Lesvi hace 7 meses que decidió tener su fuente de ingresos fija y vende granos básicos, frutas, productos de limpieza, tajadas, condimentos y otros abarrotes. Ya tiene buena clientela en su comunidad. El préstamo que solicita es de 10,000 Lempiras y lo invertirá en la compra de más productos de abarrotería para surtir su negocio e incrementar las ventas. Su plan es seguir trabajando y seguir invirtiendo para hacer crecer el negocio.
texts.en:
Lesvi, age 37, is a single mother with three children.  She lives in Puerto Cortes.

Seven months ago Lesvi decided to have a source of fixed income and sell basic grains, fruit, cleaning products, ‘tajadas’ [fried banana slices], condiments, and other groceries.  She now has good clientele in her community.

She will use the loan for 10,000 lempiras that she is requesting to buy more grocery products to stock her business and increase sales.  Her plan is to continue working and to continue investing in order to make her business grow.

loans.use: to buy grocery products like basic grains, condiments, 'tajadas' [fried banana slices], and cleaning products, etc.

loans.name: Jonathan

texts.es: Jonathan, tiene la edad  de 26 años, está casado,  vive con su esposa y dos hijos, están en la escuela. El con el crédito pretende comprar una bomba de fumigar para la plantación de café. El tiene pensado comprar  esta bomba  para fumigar de una forma más rápida  y que le rinda mas el producto y sea más efectivo y  mantener el café en buen estado y poder producir un poco mas y  poder generar más ganancias  y obtener una mejor calidad de vida y poder pagar el estudio de los hijos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Jonathan is twenty-six, married, and lives with his wife and their two children, who are in school. With the loan, he wants to buy a fumigation pump for his coffee plantation. He wants to buy the pump in order to fumigate quicklier and more efficiently, and to waste less product. That way, he can keep the coffee plants in good condition and produce a bit more, in order to increase his earnings, have a better quality of life and be able to afford his children's education. This is his first loan with field partner Fudecosur. He never even took out a loan with a state bank: he turned to Fudecosur because of the much lower interest rates and the less strict granting conditions.

loans.use: to buy a fumigation pump.

loans.name: Iris Iveth

texts.es: La señora Iris, tiene 41 años de edad, casada, tiene una hija, vive en Chamelecón, San Pedro Sula. ella tiene 9 años de dedicarse a vender comida, vende pollo frito con tajadas de banano, tacos, tajadas con carne molida, baleadas, etc. el negocio lo tiene en su casa y lo ha mantenido estable y activo, está creciendo cada día. Esta solicitando un segundo préstamo y es por 8,000 Lempiras, con el cual va comprar los insumos para la elaboración de comida para vender. Su plan es hacer crecer el negocio para obtener mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
Iris, age 41, is married and has a daughter.  She lives in Chamelecón, San Pedro Sula.

She has been selling food for nine years.  She sells fried chicken with fried banana slices, tacos, fried banana slices with ground meat, and ‘baleadas’ [flour tortillas with beans, eggs, butter, cheese and meat], etc.  The business is at her house, and she has kept it stable and active.  It is growing each day.

She is requesting a second loan for 8,000 lempiras.  She will use the loan to buy supplies to make the food she sells.  Her plan is to make her business grow and to get greater income.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make the food she sells.  She will buy meat, chicken, vegetables, condiments, and lard, etc.

loans.name: Yamilet

texts.es: Yamilet, tiene la edad  de 33 años, está casada,  vive con su esposo y dos hijos actualmente. Ella con el crédito pretende comprar dos novillos de engorde ella  cuenta ya con dos  novillos en su poder y lo que pretende es reforzar el negocio. Ella  tiene pensado engordarlos y poder venderlo en el mercado local y lugares aledaños y  poder generar más ganancias  y obtener una mejor calidad de vida y además poder pagar el estudio de los  hijos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Yamilet is 33 years old, married and currently lives with her husband and two children.  With this loan, she intends to buy two heifers to fatten.  She already owns two heifers but wants to reinforce her business.  She is planning on fattening them to be able to sell them in the local market and other neighboring places in order to generate greater profits, obtain a better quality of life and to pay for her children's schooling.  

This is the first loan that she has received from FUDECOSUR.  She had never had other loans from state-owned banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered her the loan with more ease and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: purchase two heifers for fattening

loans.name: Luis Eduardo

texts.es: Luis Eduardo, tiene la edad  de 33 años, está casado,  vive con su esposa y dos hijos, uno en la escuela y el otro en el colegio   actualmente. El con el crédito pretende comprar  insumos como abonos y fumigaciones  y un poco de herbicidas y además  ayudarse con la mano de obra. El tiene pensado comprar  estos insumos para mantener el café en buen estado y poder producir un poco mas y  poder generar más ganancias  y obtener una mejor calidad de vida y poder pagar el estudio de los hijos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Luis Eduardo is thirty-three, married, and lives with his wife and two children, one of whom is in school, while the other attends secondary school. With the loan, he wants to buy supplies for his coffee plantation, such as fertiliser, fumigation, and some herbicide. He would also like to hire help. These will help keep the plants in good condition, enabling him to produce a bit more and thus earn a bigger income to have a better quality of life and be able to afford his children's education. This is his first loan with field partner Fudecosur. He never even took out a loan with a state bank: he turned to Fudecosur because of the much lower interest rates and the less strict granting conditions.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his coffee plantation.

loans.name: Edwin Alberto

texts.es: Edwin Alberto, tiene la edad  de 46 años, está soltero,  vive con su mama actualmente. El con el crédito pretende comprar una vaca de leche, el cuenta ya con tres vacas en su poder y lo que pretende es reforzar el negocio. El tiene pensado producir más leche, queso y natilla y poder venderlo en el mercado local y lugares aledaños y  poder generar más ganancias  y obtener una mejor calidad de vida. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Edwin Alberto is forty-six and single. His mother lives with him. With the loan, he wants to buy another milk cow. He already has three, and he wants his business to grow. He plans to produce more milk, cream and cheese in order to sell these products at the local market and other places in the area, and thus increase his income and have a better quality of life. This is his first loan with field partner Fudecosur. He never even took out a loan with a state bank: he turned to Fudecosur because of the much lower interest rates and the less strict granting conditions.

loans.use: to buy a milk cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise like shoes, sneakers, boots, etc.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es:
Jorge comenzó trabajando desde los 14 años de edad como ayudante en un minimercado y así aprendió la actividad de los negocios y la venta de alimentos. Luego trabajó en una cafetería durante 4 años y durante estos años ahorró lo que más podía porque su meta fue siempre ser independiente. Hace 4 meses logró montar su propia legumbrería y ha tenido buenos clientes en el sector, y trabajando fuertemente ha logrado venir superando la dificultad de capital que tiene. Debido que al ofrecer más variedad de verduras que sus clientes han demandado sus ventas aumentarán considerablemente, Jorge busca un préstamo para comprar una estantería y verduras y frutas para surtir su negocio y ofrecer mayor variedad.

Su sueño es poder salir adelante con su propio negocio y crecer para generar empleo y en un futuro abrir su propio minimercado.
texts.en: Jorge began working when he was 14 years old as an assistant in a mini market and this is how he was able to learn the trade. He then worked in a cafeteria for 4 years and during this time, he began to save as much as he could so that he could one day be independent. Four months ago, he was able to achieve this goal and has had good customers since.By working hard, he has been able to overcome the difficulties of not having enough capital. Because he wants to offer a wider variety of vegetables to his customers, as they have asked, he believes his sales will increase considerably. Jorge is looking for a loan in order to purchase shelving and vegetables and fruits to stock his business and offer a wider selection. His dream is to be successful in his own business and to grow it enough to generate employment and in the future open his own mini market.

loans.use: To buy shelving and fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Marey

texts.en:
Marey is 25 years old. She lives in Sinkor and has two children, ages 1 and 6. She is a married, and she was not able to attend school. She's making an effort to send all her children to school. 

Since 2000, she has been preparing and selling cooked food at a restaurant. She started this business with some help from her mother. She's proud to be in this business because she can send her children to school and have some savings. 

Marey has requested a loan to purchase oil, rice, pepper, juice, and cold water for her business. Her plan for the business is to open a shop in the near future.

loans.use: To purchase oil, rice, pepper, juice, and cold water for her business

loans.name: Carlos Octavio

texts.es:
Carlos trabaja en el taller de tapicería que viene de tradición familiar, y gracias a que su padre le enseñó la actividad desde muy joven para trabajar a su lado, ahora cuenta con una gran experiencia que le permite ofrecer a sus clientes productos de muy buena calidad. Desde hace mucho tiempo que está el negocio ubicado y esto ha permitido que se posicione en el municipio, y por tanto las dificultades económicas en su hogar se habían venido superando poco a poco. Sin embargo, debido a que en los últimos meses Carlos se vio enfrentado a una dura situación familiar con uno de sus hijos, ha visto como su condición económica se ha afectado fuertemente y ha hecho que en su hogar tengan que enfrentar serias adversidades. Gracias a su esfuerzo, ha logrado superar la dificultad, pero debido a que dejó de trabajar en el taller durante unos días ha visto como los pedidos de sus clientes se retrazan y ahora no cuenta con el capital suficiente para poder responder por ellos. Es por esto que Carlos busca un préstamo para comprar materias primas que requiere para la tapicería de los pedidos retrazados que tiene por parte de sus clientes.

Carlos espera poder seguir saliendo adelante y superar la adversidad que se le ha presentado en su familia. Además, aspira a que su negocio le permita ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida en su hogar y mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Carlos works in his family's upholstery workshop.  Thanks to his father teaching him the craft at a young age, he now has a lot of experience which allows him to offer his clients high quality products.  Since the business has been around for a long time, it has attained a good standing in the community and because of that, the economic hardships in his family have been getting better little by little.  However, in the past few months due to a difficult situation with one of his sons, Carlos has come to see his financial condition be strongly affected, causing serious setbacks in his household.  

Thanks to his hard work, he has been able to overcome the difficulty, but due to the fact that he was not able to work in the shop for a few days, his clients' orders have backed up, and he does not have the capital to fulfill the orders.  For this reason, Carlos is looking for a loan to purchase the raw materials needed for the upholstery of his backordered items.  

Carlos hopes to continue prospering and overcoming the adversity that his family has faced.  Furthermore, he strives for his business to offer him a better quality of life at home and better economic opportunities for growth.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials needed for the upholstery of his clients' backordered items.

loans.name: Victor Andres

texts.es:
Victor es un joven emprendedor que comenzó trabajando desde hace mucho tiempo en un restaurante y gracias a esto aprendió la actividad de los negocios y también alcanzó a ahorrar un pequeño dinero para montar su propio negocio, ya que siempre había soñado con ser independiente. Fue así como montó una pequeña tienda general donde en un principio solo contaba con el capital suficiente para poder ofrecer a sus clientes productos básicos de la canasta familiar; ahora gracias a su esfuerzo, ha venido aumentando la variedad de productos que ofrece y adicional a los productos de la canasta familiar puede ofrecer a sus clientes comidas rápidas. Debido a que el invierno le ha venido perjudicando bastante, Victor busca un préstamo para comprar una carpa, una mesa y sillas para adecuar un espacio afuera de su tienda donde pueda atender a sus clientes cuando llueve.

Su sueño es poder tener un negocio más grande y seguir aportando económicamente en su hogar para que sus padres sigan teniendo una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Victor is a young entrepreneur who began working a long time ago in a restaurant. Thanks to this he learned the basics of business and was able to save a little money to start his own business, since he always dreamed of being independent. 

By saving, he started a small general store where, at the beginning, he only had enough money to offer basic products for the tipical pantry. Now, thanks to his efforts, he has increased the variety of products that he offers, and additional to basic pantry items, he can offer quick meals to his customers. 

Wintertime has arrived and it is hurting his business. 

Victor is requesting a loan to buy a tent, table, and seats so he can attend to his customers when it rains. 

His dream is to be able to have a larger business and continue contributing financially to his home. This way his parents may continue to have a better quality of life and better economical opportunities.

loans.use: to buy a tent, table, and seats to accomodate enough space outside of his store where he can support customers when it rains.

loans.name: Oliva De Jesus

texts.es:
Oliva salió de su municipio natal hacia la ciudad desde los 13 años de edad para buscar trabajo y poder mejorar las condiciones económicas, ya que sus padres eran muy pobres. En la cuidad consiguió trabajo con diferentes empresas, también se casó y tuvo 3 hijos, pero cuando el padre de sus hijos la abandonó quedó sola a cargo del sostenimiento de sus hijos. Así, trabajó durante unos 3 meses gratis para una señora por la comida para ella y sus 3 hijos y también le enseñó la actividad de la confección, lo que luego le permitió emplearse en una empresa de confecciones por más de 20 años. Ahora tiene la ventaja de que un hijo suyo ya es mayor y tiene un trabajo con el que le colabora para seguir sosteniendo el hogar y sus otros 2 hijos, y esto ha permitido ir mejorando la calidad de vida en el hogar. Por dificultades de salud, Oliva se vio obligada a dejar su trabajo, pero como aún requiere de los ingresos para sostener el hogar, decidió montar el taller de confección en su casa con una máquina básica y así poder trabajar poco a poco. Como no cuenta con un gran capital en su taller de confección, Oliva busca un préstamo para comprar telas e hilos para confeccionar su propia línea de prendas de vestir.

Su sueño es poder seguir gozando de buena salud para seguir trabajando y poder sacar adelante sus 3 hijos ofreciéndoles una buena calidad de vida y el acceso a una educación de calidad a sus 2 hijos menores. También sueña con en un futuro poder tener una casa propia.
texts.en: Olivia left her home town when she was 13 years old in order to look for work and to improve her economic conditions because her parents were very poor. In the city, she was able to find employment at different businesses and she also married and had 3 children, but when the father of her children left her,  she was left alone to care for them. And so, she worked for free for 3 months for a woman just for food for herself and her children, but she also learned to sew, which allowed her to get a job as a seamstress for more than 20 years. Now, she has the advantage of having her oldest child who has a job and helps her to maintain her home and her other 2 children, and this has helped her to improve the quality of life at home. But because of health problems, Olivia has been obligated to quit her job, but because she needs to still earn an income, she has decided to open her own sewing business from home with her basic machine and in this way be able to work a little bit at a time. Because she doesn't have a lot of money to invest in her new business, she is looking for a loan to purchase fabric and thread to start her own clothing line. Her dream is to be able to enjoy good health and to continue to work and for her 3 children to be successful, to give them a better quality of life and access to quality education for her 2 youngest children. She also dreams to one day own her own home.

loans.use: purchase fabric and thread.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
Gladys aprendió a cocinar desde muy joven al lado de sus tías, y ahora para colaborarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar y generar su propio ingreso se dedicó a vender algunos alimentos que vendía cada 15 días. Gracias a que le fue bien con este negocio, Gladys comenzó a incrementar los días en que ofrecía a sus clientes los alimentos y ahora trabaja todos los días vendiendo cafés en las mañanas, almuerzos y otros alimentos a sus clientes. Desde que comenzó a generar ingresos, las condiciones económicas en su hogar han mejorado considerablemente, lo que ha permitido que su esposo y sus 3 hijos puedan acceder a una mejor calidad de vida. Buscando aumentar sus ingresos y aprovechando que sus clientes le siguen comprando cada vez más, Gladys busca un préstamo para comprar un termo para el café y una olla más grande donde preparar los alimentos.

Así, espera que sus ventas aumenten considerablemente y sus ingresos permitan tener en su hogar una mejor estabilidad económica, permitiendo que sus hijos accedan a una educación de mejor calidad y en su hogar tengan una mejor calidad de vida. Su sueño es poder salir adelante con su familia y llegar a tener su casa propia.
texts.en: Gladys learned to cook when she was very young at the side of her aunts and now she share the responsibilities of household costs with her husband and to generate her own income, she sells foods every 15 days. Thanks to the fact that this enterprise has went well, Gladys began to increase the number of days she sold food and now she works every day selling coffees in the morning, lunches and other foods to her customers. Since she began to generate an income, the economic conditions in her home have improved considerably, which has been allowed her husband and her 3 children to enjoy a higher quality of life. Looking to increase her profits, she is taking advantage of of the fact that her customers keep buying more and more. Gladys is looking for a loan to purchase a thermos for the coffee and a bigger pot to cook the food in. In this way, she hopes that her sales will increase and that the profits will allow her to have a more stable economic stability in her home, allowing her children access to a better quality education and a better quality of life. Her dream is to be successful, along with her family, and to one day own her own home.

loans.use: purchase a thermos for coffee and a bigger pot to prepare foods.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy milk for her husband's milk and yogurt selling-business

loans.name: Juraboy

texts.ru: Дом, где живет Джурабой,  не отвечает стандартам жилья и он срочно должен отремонтировать свой дом. Ему 39 лет, он женат на прекрасной женщине, которую зовут Мамлакат и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Его жена швея. Дети учатся в средней школе и всегда просят родителей отремонтировать их дом, но его доход от скотоводства не достаточно для этого. Он должен отремонтировать крышу, так как скоро начнется дождевой сезон. Джурабой запрашивает кредит на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов для ремонта дома. Джурабой и его дети будут ждать, пока добрые кредиторы помогут им решить проблему жилья.
texts.en:
Juraboy's house is substandard and needs to be repaired urgently. Juraboy is 39 years old and married to a wonderful woman named Mamlakat. They are raising three children. Juraboy's wife is a seamstress. His children are in middle school and are always asking their parents to repair the house, but his income from animal farming cannot cover it.
Juraboy must repair the roof as the rain season will start soon. He has requested a loan of 3,000 Somoni to buy building materials for repairing his house. Juraboy and his children ask the lenders' to kindly help them solve their housing problem.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as cement and wood for repairing his house

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Luz Marina recibió clases en el área de la fabricación de calzado y desde entonces fabrica sandalias y bolsos que vende a vecinos, amigos y referidos. Decidió iniciar su negocio para poder generar ingresos con los que colaborara en su hogar a tener una mejor calidad de vida para su esposo y sus 4 hijos, dado que las condiciones económicas estaban en grandes dificultades. La mayor ventaja que tiene es poder manejar su propio tiempo para poder ofrecerles el tiempo necesario a sus hijos preparándoles la comida y arreglándolos para ir a la escuela. Gracias a que últimamente ha tenido buenas ventas, Luz Marina busca un préstamo para comprar sintético, suelas e hilos y fabricar los pedidos que no ha podido responder por falta de capital.

Su sueño es poder sacar su familia adelante brindándoles una buena calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas, además de en un futuro llegar a tener su casa propia. También aspira a algún día poder tener su almacén de venta de calzado donde ofrezca sus propios productos.
texts.en:
Luz Marina took classes in her area, learning how to make shoes. Since that time, she has been making sandals and handbags which she sells to neighbors, friends and customers who are referred to her. She decided to start her business so that she could generate income, which she uses to contribute to her household and achieve a better quality of life for her husband and their 4 children, since they were in a very difficult economic situation. The greatest advantage she has is that she can manage her own time, so that she can offer her children the time they need, preparing their food and getting them ready for school. Thanks to the fact that she has had good sales recently, Luz Marina is seeking a loan to buy synthetic material, soles and threads so she can fulfill orders she was not able to fill due to a lack of capital. 

Her dream is to be able to help her family get ahead, providing them with a good quality of life and better economic opportunities. In addition, in the future she hopes to be able to have her own house. She also aspires to have her own shoe store one day, where she can offer her own products.

loans.use: to buy synthetic material, soles and thread to make shoes in response to customer orders.

loans.name: Monica Janeth

texts.es:
Monica ha trabajado durante varios años en la actividad de venta de mercancías y venta en almacenes, lo que le ha permitido adquirir una gran experiencia y poder así tener los conocimientos básicos para llevar su propio negocio. Después de trabajar durante 7 años vendiendo productos en un almacén, con unos ahorros decidió hacer el esfuerzo y montar su propio negocio de venta de productos de uso personal, y a pesar de que cuando montó su negocio tenía grandes dificultades de capital, su esfuerzo le ha permitido sacarlo adelante y captar cada vez más clientes. Con su negocio las condiciones económicas de su hogar han mejorado y ahora contribuye junto con su esposo para tener en su familia una mayor estabilidad económica. Buscando satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes y superar también su dificultad de capital, Monica busca un préstamo para comprar productos de uso personal y surtir su almacén con productos que se han ido agotando.

Su sueño es llegar a tener un gran negocio donde pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas y también poder ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Monica has worked for several years in the sale of merchandise and sales in stores.  This has allowed her to acquire a lot of experience and be able to gain basic knowledge about how to run her own business.  After working for seven years selling products in a shop with some savings she decided to make the effort and start her own business of sales of personal products.  Despite the fact that when she started her business she had great difficulties with capital, her efforts have allowed her to get ahead and get ever more customers.

With her business, the economic conditions of her home have improved and now she contributes together with her husband to give her family more economic stability.  Looking to satisfy the needs of her customers and also overcome the difficulty of capital, Monica is seeking a loan to buy personal use projects and stock her shop with products that have been running out.  

Her dream is to have a large business where she can generate jobs for people who need them and also offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy personal use products and stock her store with products that have been running out.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy the required ingredients for her husband's food cart
